channel.title: [Non]Map not loading?
channel.description:
Now it just started recently that when I tele to gwd I started getting a "map loading error", not an error but i go in a loop of logging out and logging in on the server and it won't load my character in gwds map, so im a little stuck on why this is happening. I haven't't changed any of the code. I re-uploaded the files and redid the coding for gwd map, yet I'm still getting this weird map error. I can spawn to the saradomin boss room with only one logout and relogin, but once I get the second level, the main room, it goes hay weird. If I close the source the client shows all the npcs i spawn and my character for a sec until it says lost connection to the server. What did I do wrong? I'm pretty sure its not the server side since all the gwd coding is in the client.
*Note* I loads everything else besides the area of gwd map

item.title: [Non]Map not loading?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
